headline: House Republicans Demand Twitter Board Preserve All Records Related To Musk Buyout Bid.
author: Glenn Reynolds
sentences: According to a Friday letter seen by CNBC, House Judiciary Committee Republicans led by ranking member Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) have asked Twitter board chairman Bret Taylor to preserve any communications from both official and personal accounts – including those sent using encryption – that have anything to do with Musk’s offer.”

TWITTER NEEDS TO BE THOROUGHLY INVESTIGATED ON SEVERAL FRONTS: “18 House Republicans have demanded that Twitter’s board preserve all records related to Elon Musk’s buyout offer – suggesting that they will conduct a congressional probe if their party regains control of the chamber this fall.
